brief_title: Comparison of Biphasic Insulin Aspart 70/30 With Anti-Diabetic Drugs in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
brief_summary: This trial is conducted in the United States of America (USA). The purpose of this study is to test whether biphasic insulin aspart 70/30 is a safe and at least as effective alternative in combination with two oral anti-diabetics compared to the two oral anti-diabetics alone for the control of blood glucose.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Subjects with type 2 diabetes mellitus
mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
